name: ens-sync-script
description: looks up owner of ensname on stream creation and creates stream

scripts.buildlocalArch: npm run prepare && docker build -t streamr/ens-sync-script:dev-fastchain .
scripts.buildMultiarchAndPush: npm run prepare && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t streamr/ens-sync-script:dev-fastchain --push .

author: Streamr Network AG <contact@streamr.network>
